website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S9 puts the latest LTE bands and a great low-light camera into a smaller form factor than the S9+ for the best one-handed phone right now.
pros: Better sound and network support than the Galaxy S8
cons: Not a radical upgrade from the Galaxy S8
Larger S9+ model has better cameras, more RAM, and stronger Wi-Fi performance

customer_reviews.title: Killer phone, except if upgrading from S8
customer_reviews.text: Very good but not a great leap forward over the S8, especially after the recent update to the S8 (3/18). Still, it's lovely phone, finger print sensor is better and faster then S8 & S7 but wish it was on the front. Still getting used to the camera but can't as yet distinguish much difference to it's predecessor ie very good. In reality i should have skipped this generation and waited for the S10?. Anybody not upgrading from a S8 will be blown away and be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scaryhalo

customer_reviews.title: Numerous dead spots on the screen, otherwise okay.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is faulty and Amazon support have only been able to suggest doing a factory reset despite the fact that this is clearly a hardware issue. The phone is fast and powerful but the dead spots on the screen make it impossible to type which makes every interaction with the phone painful.
customer_reviews.author: DeHidel

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S9
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal the S9 is a great phone,It work's well with all apps and games. No problem being the international version you just select English on start-up and away you go . I recommend you watch some video's on YouTube to get the best out of it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this phone, not because anything was wrong with it...I just wanted to get the S9+ instead with the bigger screen. Except for the screen size, there is nothing wrong with this phone - good phone at a good price and the seller was very helpful with the refund! I will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Wouter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ve ordered this phone in october 2018, since then it works super! I m in love with this phone. It charges really quickly, battery life is good, great quality,love the colour, works smooth, no hardware or software problems. Delivery was fast, sealed package all new! Came with UK and EU plug. Best phone i ever bought! 1 year after purchase edit: there is a slightly change in the battery life, charges quickly but doesn't last all day. I m not on my phone all the time but i watch YouTube videos and using other apps like before.
customer_reviews.author: Andreea Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and not UK version
customer_reviews.text: On first use the camera isn't working and freezes up the app when you try and switch to front camera. When I took it to the Samsung shop it emerged this isn't the UK version of the phone, it's eastern European. Build quality not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive buying a used phone as opposed to my last phone which was refurbished but this is working perfectly so far. It looks excellent and is not too big. Only a minor mark on the screen but otherwise looks and works as new. Battery life seems reasonable and the apps are very responsive. Assuming I don't lose this phone like I did the last, this will hopefully be a great phone for the next few years...
customer_reviews.author: AudioVisual

customer_reviews.title: Regretted buying this every single day
customer_reviews.text: Don't think I'll be buying another Samsung phone anytime soon. Cons: horrible battery life - wouldn't last a few hours - tip: always check the battery capacity of the phone you're buying! The most important feature if you ask me. After all, if it doesn't last - then no use. Full of bloatware. Common issue with this brand. So many preinstalled apps I didn't ask for and no way to remove. Horrible sound. Super late critical security updates and Android OS upgrades. Mainly due to their customisation. Over saturated colours. List goes on. Pros: Really nice screen and resolution. (Colours off though so.. )
customer_reviews.author: C.A

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST INVESTMENT I HAVE EVER MADE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this phone even though it works almost like any other phones that cost €200 or less. They are the ones I normally buy before this handset. I decided to buy Samsung Galaxy s9 for its storage capacity which is 64GB. Unlocking the phone with fingerprint is very handy and quick. Love the stereo speakers, loud and clear when watching videos and listening to music. I have three phone updates so far and it has not been acting up, that's a good news. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Samsung's phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone ordered blue but got black but that's not a problem easy to use but l have had Samsung's for along time now so nothing too new , battery life is what l would expect so no surprises there . l would suggest that you stick with the phone you are familiar with otherwise you might not like the changes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For international use make sure its used first in the UK/EU.
customer_reviews.text: After a hiccup concerning whether the phone could be used internationally the seller was able to assure me that once used in the UK for a minimum of two minutes it would then work outside of the UK/EU. Now I’m looking forward to using it in the Caribbean. It would be great if the seller had a FAQs to indicate what was required for use outside of this region.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Just received it yesterday and I have to give it 4 stars because I ordered Coral Blue and I received Midnight Black. No time to bother with replacement. Bought it for my wife, apart from the camera the phone looks the same as my old S8. Definitely not worth buying this if you have an S8. Will come back with an update about the performance in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: DONJAME

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful staff who reassured me that the phone is all good, Thank you. Beautiful phone, no marks what's so ever! Gorgeous color and very light to hold, great for my little hands! Delivery was on time, quick and well packaged. Thank you so much, you have one happy customer! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmaRolling

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !
customer_reviews.text: Well I wasn't sure wether to buy this phone but honestly it's fantastic, great camera , I love the super so motion, makes me laugh lol, great to hold and looks great, I don't see an issue with it so far and I have had it 5 days now, it also came early which was a nice surprise, quality of pictures and movement is great. So far so good, deffianly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought .I thought I had ordered the Samsung s9plus but wrong I this model instead and it suits me fine. great improvement on my s7
customer_reviews.author: john A

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone as my old one started having battery problems. I'm happy to say that I have no regrets upgrading. Such a high quality phone for a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Hadrian

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant purchase...100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present to myself to replace an S6. Fantastic value compared to getting as part of a contract and this phone is absolutely like new (without original box) but A1 condition, with all cables and a stunning set of AKG earphones included. Quick delivery...absolutely 100% happy with the compant and product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Haskayne

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Phone came earlier than expected, packaging was great. Although I did order a UK version, a european one arrived instead, but it had a UK plug. This phone's definitely the real deal, but the only downside is the battery life. Runs on a full charge for a day before beeping for some energy.
customer_reviews.author: Knot

customer_reviews.title: Appalling Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is a joke, have to charge it during the day to get it to work long enough to get home. Battery saver at set at highest setting but one (so it doesn't turn into a dumb phone)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. Ordered on the 15th December and delivered on the 21st ahead of schedule. As it was a present for someone else I can’t review the battery life or how easy it is to use. But it certainly looked great and was the best value for this product that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Mc Grath

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour charge!
customer_reviews.text: 6 hours to charge after 6 month use and quick charge is on. Your having a laugh. I knew I should have stuck to my old brand
customer_reviews.author: Litma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality S9 Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice phone, with lovely camera quality. I'm still discovering features on the phone. The phone was delivered quickly. I am quite pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: kazj

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my partner she seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Previously she was using the S7 and this seems to be quite a step up. The battery life doesn't seem to last as long as it does on my iPhone XS but it think the camera (particularly the rear) looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Philip & Amy

customer_reviews.title: samsung galaxy s9
customer_reviews.text: I dislike nothing about this phone. I love the s9, I love raise to wake and particularly the message delivery reports, its fast my best friend. thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: It came in great condition however keeps showing needs service provider reset but i just ignore that
customer_reviews.author: Clayton414

customer_reviews.title: Techgold delivered well on time !
customer_reviews.text: Lovely unit with hundreds of features Feels lovely. Had the phone for but over a week and still finding out new things that it can do to keep me amused and informed. Good service from Techgold.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Looks bran new. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Smart mobile so easy to set up. No Mark's looks new. Will update comment when had it a month. Happy with my S9.
customer_reviews.author: tracey van beck

customer_reviews.title: High tech made simple.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Easy to use. Convenient in every way. Excellent display and camera quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dalzell

customer_reviews.title: very Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone and I love it it is very good and easy to use, I would recommend to anyone to buy it is a very good for value.
customer_reviews.author: santoscarla

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Not a current generation phone but you wouldn't know it form the features and speed. Very high quality product, extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Graham H.

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever owned. Sold as a second-hand phone, you would've never known. There is absolutely zero sign of previous use, as it was a display unit, and it works perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Phone for my son he is very happy with it as he is a big fan of android
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried this deal was too good to be true... However I've used this phone for 2 weeks now and I can't fault it. I chose Grade B used, and the phone is in near perfect condition having only a chip on one corner. The phone was delivered the morning after ordering, I'm very impressed with the price- I'm glad I didn't buy new!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works as it is supposed to , better than my S7 edge which would do as it pleased.
customer_reviews.author: scallywag3

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone no problem so far, upgraded from a S5 and the new S9 is far more better than S5, though my S5 is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Samsung I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Easy to navigate - all information on "how to use" is located in settings "About this device". Fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: ANIRAY

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with the battery life. Depending on what I've been doing, occasionally doesn't last a day. Not quite as user friendly as anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Sold with root
customer_reviews.text: Got the phone from Amazon warehouse and installed my apps and tried to load my banking app and said the phone was rooted. Someone with the phone before me had put a custom ROM on it. Returned straight away. Poor service from Amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Simon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Great phone arrived on time love the s9 great phone arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Senga Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have never swayed from Samsung as they never disappoint. Great pho e. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi Seaker

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: As it said almost news, no complain. Only thing is not included charger,!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Genuine phone. Amazing price. Happy Samsung fan. :))
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Was a little worried not buying 'brand new' but the saving was well worth it. Phone arrived pristine. Smallest damage to the box. More than happy to reccommend this seller. Brilliant genuine Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good product low price fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good is unlocked I got the internațional version Coral blue, the phone is very good don't forget to buy a case and screen protector for it
customer_reviews.author: Ioja Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Camera broke
customer_reviews.text: The camera breaks within six months of purchase, no reason, if u regularly take photos, not the phone for you
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s9 64 gig single sim
customer_reviews.text: This samsung s9 is the bees knees ,had iPhone phones before but I must say samsung have out done themselves . Lovely colour blue easy to use and very responsive
customer_reviews.author: Alan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. My partner is very happy as I myself use an iPhone. Great camera and looks similar to apple.
customer_reviews.author: Przemo79

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Like a New Phone
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this phone. Was a bit worried about buying a secondhand phone but this one came in original packinging and works perfectly. No sign of previous usage. Phone was also unlocked and delivery was very quick. Overall very happy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: nica

customer_reviews.title: Wasting money
customer_reviews.text: First of all the phone was faulty, second nobody bother to give a proper return label so my parcel was lost and no money back. Personally I don’t recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sanda Soveja

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its been a few months, and kid was happy with it so far. I assume everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: A very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the S9. Sleek design. Display is excellent. Camera is great. All in all a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Devavratt Bagayat

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I u I bought Samsung coz I'm out of money when my phone got lost.. I was surprised thoughc .. It's amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Annoying now
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a great phone at first but only months after buying it having to lock and unlock phone for it to work or it keeps doing random things on it's own. Really weird and annoying
customer_reviews.author: Caza T

customer_reviews.title: Returned- faulty - no refund still waiting
customer_reviews.text: Sim tray would not open, returned 28th Feb still waiting for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lance kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, excellent product and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described no visual damages. Quality great camera and all other functions working properly currently. Good value for money and good purchase
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used to have IPhone, but now I am in love with this, it takes great photos, easy to use, lots of memory!
customer_reviews.author: OscarJShrimpton

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived from Hong Kong, box does not look genuine and was not Samsung sealed. Device is not packaged in same way as a genuine device and does not fill me with any confidence of being a genuine device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Condition is very good and the phone itself works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Phone came in great condition just like it said It would. Upgraded from the s8 and I'm really happy with this phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone is good but overheats quickly
customer_reviews.text: This phone is good but i noticed it overheats quickly, don't know if its a design fault or if its from the supplier overall its fast and good, the battery seems to be dodgy as well drains too fast
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. A. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good value product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as present opened box and turned on looks the business and know recipient will be over the moon
customer_reviews.author: Jo jo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S9, spot on.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brought this phone, she's over the moon with it, works and looks excellent, very minimal marks, would go here again.
customer_reviews.author: Don's

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. No problems whatsoever. Buying from Amazon big saving on price.
customer_reviews.author: suezarella

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues Battery never last
customer_reviews.text: Well i bought this Galaxy S9 on Black Friday i was expecting to get red of the battery issue i had with my previous phone but apparently it's still the same issue the battery since I bought it it never last over three hours. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sid A.

customer_reviews.title: Came locked on the 3 network!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung S9 is a good phone. The delivery came a day later than expected and the phone came locked on the 3 network!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good refurbished phone- looked near enoughlike new
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.. very good condition. Battery life seems good. Company helped as charger they sent was faulty so sent another out to me promptly.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and even better customer service after the purchase, can not fault the company at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Neale

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected which is always a bonus. So far so good, the phone looked brand new and in hreat condition which i was surprised about but cant complain overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived well packed. Box sealed but no outer wrapper. UK plug in box. Only switched on as yet as it is a Christmas gift. So far so good...fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with delivery time ,the phone was in a1 condition, no scratches,great price .
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great seller great phone!! 5🌟
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone. It is immaculate condition as described. The seller was great in communication. Very pleased absolutely recommend you a man of his word. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S9 the best
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, reliable, fast, does what it says on the tin. Always buy a Samsung phone so your not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S9
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, arrived new in box with charger and headphones etc.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price, as far as i can tell there are no signs of use (a good refurbishment) and would definitely buy again if prompted.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband, happy life?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my husband's birthday because he needed a new phone! He seems super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: StagieTechie

customer_reviews.title: Transfer of apps
customer_reviews.text: All apps were transferred easily from previous phone but not all settings and game progress.

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to standards
customer_reviews.text: This products lives up to the modern day standards of technology. Recently went on a night out and the pictures were crisp and clean. Recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Good value smartphone
customer_reviews.text: The phone has a large clear screen. It was easy to set up and get started. Very pleased with its performance.

customer_reviews.title: Good All Round Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, I have one myself and bought one for my fiancee, who despite scepticism has converted from IPhone!

customer_reviews.title: Great phone / Great seller
customer_reviews.text: The seller responded immediately to my queries- twice. I have only had the phone a few days - but so far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Not UK phone!
customer_reviews.text: The phone that was sent was not a UK phone. Mobile data can not be used as it doesn't recognize the local signal.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully phone case. Original design and easy to put on. My phone will definitely be safe.

customer_reviews.title: Discription accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great product.great phone, In very good condition, very pleased with service

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mobile at a premium price
customer_reviews.text: The mobile is excellent is every way. However it should be given the price tag.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, thank you so much for getting it to me in a few days

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery 100% happy. Only problem is I ordered a single SIM but got a duo SIM instead.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your phone as it's a little heavy, invest in a decent case
customer_reviews.text: I've lots more to learn after using an iphone5s. The camera quality on my samsung is much better.

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, came a day before expected, can’t fault it

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Came when promised, product was as described and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: I Like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Working fin after more then 1 year. Survived a lot of downfalls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory sealed
customer_reviews.text: S9 Italian version fulfilled by Amazon Just a brief note about packaging. This came as a factory sealed unit. No damage or tampering. EU plug included so you will need to buy UK adaptor. Easy to set to English. See photo for what's in the box.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not great imo
customer_reviews.text: Brought this after my s8+ broke and I'm very unhappy. The front camera doesn't have any good "filters" (no selective focus).. the battery life is just as before. It still also freezes up (screen will go blabk for a few seconds) just feels like I've downgraded and been ripped off in the progress.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Awful battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery, which I consider to be the most important part of a phone because if it won't turn on you may as well not have a phone, lasts for no more than 7 hours with light usage and with the battery consumption set to its lowest possible level. Great features, however. Comically small, inadequate battery.
customer_reviews.author: William Lamb

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: not bad thought it would be bigger screen am still using my S7 Samsung galaxy s7 upgrade doing it fine but calls on the s9 are clear maybe cause it's new but great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lucyan Pawlowski

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE COST!
customer_reviews.text: I always make my phone purchase with this seller because he is so trust worthy. The phone came earlier than expected on request at no extra cost and it was brand new in the box and sealed. I waited to write this review to make sure I got my money's worth and now I can confidently tell you it's worth the price. Excellent battery life, fast charging, excellent, excellent excellent!!!! Pictures... The emoji sealed it for me #GRIN# for those who upgrade from a different Samsung product like S5, expect a completely different experience... I'm still learning. I would always recommend this seller/product, true to his words and really good with communicating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: S 9 is a great phone
customer_reviews.text: lovit had it a few months now works and no bugs

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Set-up was super easy with Smart Switch. I've had no issues at all.

customer_reviews.title: Not noticeably better than the S7
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to be any faster or better than the S7 that it replaced and most of the apps seem to crash more often
customer_reviews.author: roger nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone and great seller! They helped me to have the phone in 2 days even if the delivery was expected in more than 7 (Italian version). The phone works perfectly in UK and come also with an international charger. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: to get me to buy another phone there will have to be a great leap forward from the S7 Edge.
customer_reviews.text: I dont think this a better phone than my S7 edge, i cant really see any improvements, it seems harder to navigate and the battery drains quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JohnTheMod53

customer_reviews.title: A very good phone.
customer_reviews.text: A very good phone. Fast, capable, plenty of memory. I'm hoping it lasts 4 years at least as I can't afford to keep buying new ones at this price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Galaxy S9 is my first Samsung phone and all I can say it's a great one, I ordered the International Version. I like that is very slim, the camera is really good and the colours are amazing, battery lasts a day without problem. Fast delivery, came in great condition and I'm very happy with it. Don't hesitate to order one if You are a Samsung fan you won't be disappointed. Good value for money too !
customer_reviews.author: Anna

product_meta.title: Samsung Smartphone Galaxy S9 (Single Sim) 64GB UK Version - Midnight Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:UK Version| Colour Name:Midnight Black| Configuration:Single SimSamsung Star 64GB Black - Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass 5, 3D Touch (home button only) - Always-on display. Features: Geo-tagging, simultaneous 4K video and 9MP image recording, touch focus, face/smile detection, Auto HDR, panorama; Video - 2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, HDR, dual-video rec.

BOX CONTAINS


 * Samsung Galaxy S9
 * USB cable
 * USB-C connector
 * Micro USB connector
 * Headphones
 * Sim removal key
 * USB power adaptor
 * Quick start guide
 * USB connector leaflet
feature_bullets: Dual Aperture lens adapts like the human eye: the Galaxy S9 is able to automatically switch between various lighting conditions with ease—making your photos look great whether it's bright or dark, day or night
Super Slow-mo lets you see the things you could have missed in the blink of an eye: set the video to music or turn it into a looping GIF, and share it with a tap
Create an Augmented Reality version of yourself simply by taking a selfie, then share your real-life feelings as emoji stickers and videos
Get real-time translations when you need it: Live Translation lets you see the world in a new way (Samsung Account login and data network (Wi-Fi or internet connection) required)
Easily share photos and videos you've made by syncing your devices through your Samsung Account, so you can be at home even when you're someplace else

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
